title: Linux Mint 21.3 “Virginia” Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New
description:
Linux Mint 21.3 "Virginia" distribution is now available for download with Cinnamon, Xfce, and MATE editions based on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish). Here's what's new!

The post Linux Mint 21.3 “Virginia” Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Is Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.5 from Ubuntu 23.10
description:
Canonical has updated the kernel of the long-term supported Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) operating system series to the Linux 6.5 HWE (Hardware Enablement) series from Ubuntu 23.10 (Mantic Minotaur).

The post Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Is Now Powered by Linux Kernel 6.5 from Ubuntu 23.10 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Linux Kernel 4.14 Reaches End of Life After More Than Six Years of Maintenance
description:
Linux 4.14 LTS kernel series has reached end of life after being maintained for more than six years, receiving a total of 336 point releases.

The post Linux Kernel 4.14 Reaches End of Life After More Than Six Years of Maintenance appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Security-Oriented Qubes OS Is Now Pre-Installed on StarBook Mk VI Linux Laptops
description:
The StarBook Mk VI Linux notebook from Star Labs is now officially certified for the security-oriented Qubes OS distribution.

The post Security-Oriented Qubes OS Is Now Pre-Installed on StarBook Mk VI Linux Laptops appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
